name: Bullet Ball
description:
Bullet Ball is a soccer game where you use your gun and your fist to smack the ball around the stage. Watch out though, your opponent might parry your bullet back at you or deflect it into the ball and smack it into into the goal.

A local multiplayer game for 2 or 4 players. 
Requires Xbox controllers to play.

Move = Left stick
Shoot = A
Parry = X
Aim = Left Trigger
Dash = Right Trigger

Pause = Start
